channel.title: Help again please
channel.description: In my client folder I have like 10,000 files, How can i make it so it just says like "Play Game" or Whatever, Like Hiding all the files, or whatever. Thanks.

item.title: Help again please
item.dc:creator: @slay603 slay603
item.description:
@slay603 wrote:

you could create a shortcut then have all your files in another folder

so… in a folder you have Play (insertname).bat then (insertname) client

everything in the client folder is the “10000 files” your talking about

Read full topic
